name: try-on-app-backend
description: Professional Try-On App - Full Stack Monolithic

scripts.setup:dev: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build ../ && cd .. && node src/seeders/createTables.js && npm run seed:users
scripts.setup:prod: npm ci && cd client && npm ci --only=production && npm run build && cp -r build ../ && cd .. && node src/seeders/resetDatabase.js && npm run db:alter && npm run seed:users
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build ../
